devdoc.author: Forked implementation with minor compatibility modifications. Original source: https://github.com/mudgen
devdoc.custom:advice: If your project's complexity requires it, consider creating your own implementationConsider adding events and more parameters to the custom errors throughout the Diamond contracts for improved monitoring

constructor.details: Be aware that `data` is executed with delegatecall on the `DiamondInit` contract

devdoc.title: Diamond

OwnershipTransferred(address,address).notice: Emitted when diamond owner is updated

constructor.notice: Sets the diamond owner, cuts the @param _diamondCutFacet address, and then calls the `DiamondInit` contract with `data`

userdoc.notice: Diamond proxy contract. Serves as the primary entry point for the protocol
